title: Cool MP3 Splitter And Joiner  2.2 [Latest]
description:
=============================================
	             Cool MP3 Splitter 2.2
           =============================================
	

***** In This File *****

	1. Overview
	2. Major Features
	3. Requirements   
	4. Installation
	5. For More Information

***** Overview *****
	Cool MP3 Splitter allows you to split up MP3 files into 
 smaller MP3 files and easy to use. It is a useful tool for creating
 one or more sections of a large MP3 song, such as your favorite
 radio shows, concerts, trance mixes, etc. It is especially useful
 for creating audio CDs. You can use three methods to split: by
 custom section, by time and by size. Furthermore, Multi-Thread
 split technology has been used in Cool MP3 Splitter to get high
 performance.

***** Major Features *****
	* Quick and easy to use.
	* Split MP3 file by THREE methods.
	* Support one MP3 file over 1000 MB.
	* Fade-in/Out.
	* Join MP3 files.
	* A mini MP3 player builds in.
	* Multi-Thread splitting.
	* "Pre-listen" mode

***** Requirements *****
	* Pentium class PC or above, 4M Memory, 4M Hard disk.
	* Windows 95/98/ME/NT/2000/XP/Vista

Instructions:

1. Extract to any location with Winrar.
2. Run with Splitter.exe

Enjoy!!
